name: Light on Time
description:
You are a lighthouse running late for work on your first day.

How embarassing!

If you don't get there on time you eill surely get fired, so you better run!

This project is made for a GameJam of 48h. The Theme of the jam was "Island" and we created a game about a lighthouse character who haves to arrive right on time at work beacause everything is dark until he gets to his place to light the islands. 

Controls 

(PS Controller)

Left Joystick - Move Character

Right Joystick - Move Camera

Circle - Jump

L2 - Turn On/Off Light

Creators

Joan Mesalles - Programmer / Game Designer 

Aitor Garrido - 2D / 3D Artist 

Diego Requena - Rigger / Animator
